name: catAnod
description:
Once upon a time there lived... no. catAnod hasn't got a prominent plot or cute characters. But this simple puzzle will be a nice activity for your brain. Pleasant music and interface will make the process more enjoyable. Connect positive and negative elements to get a whole chain. Be careful and avoid a short circuit. The game is a good choice for both adults and children. There's always a way to spend some quality time and one of them is to buy catAnod.

Features:

- Achievements;
- 30+ levels;
- Nice music
